body_html:
@vrv Thank you!

Your tip works.

I upgrade to 0.6.0 by $ pip install https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.6.0-py2-none-any.whl.

I am a fresher in tensorflow. May I ask you one more question?

I execute the word2vec_optimized.py on pycharm. The output below seems right.

When I inspect the code, I find that it should execute -- print("Epoch %4d Step %8d: lr = %5.3f words/sec = %8.0f\r" % (epoch, step, lr, rate), end="").

But in console its output does not appear, while the later output of [print("Eval %4d/%d accuracy = %4.1f%%" % (correct, total, correct * 100.0 / total))] shows.

Besides, I can' t find the file vocab.txt or model.ckpt created by the program. I think the files haven' t been created yet.

How can I fix it?

Console Information:
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/local_device.cc:40] Local device intra op parallelism threads: 4
I tensorflow/core/common_runtime/direct_session.cc:58] Direct session inter op parallelism threads: 4
I tensorflow/models/embedding/word2vec_kernels.cc:149] Data file: text8 contains 100000000 bytes, 17005207 words, 253854 unique words, 71290 unique frequent words.
Data file: text8
Vocab size: 71290 + UNK
Words per epoch: 17005207
Eval analogy file: questions-words.txt
Questions: 17827
Skipped: 1717

Eval 1446/17827 accuracy = 8.1%

Eval 2217/17827 accuracy = 12.4%

Eval 3084/17827 accuracy = 17.3%

Eval 3669/17827 accuracy = 20.6%

Eval 4140/17827 accuracy = 23.2%

Eval 4423/17827 accuracy = 24.8%

Eval 4699/17827 accuracy = 26.4%

Eval 5061/17827 accuracy = 28.4%

Eval 5271/17827 accuracy = 29.6%

Eval 5542/17827 accuracy = 31.1%

Eval 5694/17827 accuracy = 31.9%

Eval 5946/17827 accuracy = 33.4%

Eval 6053/17827 accuracy = 34.0%

Eval 6173/17827 accuracy = 34.6%

Eval 6218/17827 accuracy = 34.9%

Process finished with exit code 0
body_text:
@vrv Thank you!
Your tip works.
I upgrade to 0.6.0 by $ pip install https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.6.0-py2-none-any.whl.
I am a fresher in tensorflow. May I ask you one more question?
I execute the word2vec_optimized.py on pycharm. The output below seems right.
When I inspect the code, I find that it should execute -- print("Epoch %4d Step %8d: lr = %5.3f words/sec = %8.0f\r" % (epoch, step, lr, rate), end="").
But in console its output does not appear, while the later output of [print("Eval %4d/%d accuracy = %4.1f%%" % (correct, total, correct * 100.0 / total))] shows.
Besides, I can' t find the file vocab.txt or model.ckpt created by the program. I think the files haven' t been created yet.
How can I fix it?

body:
@vrv Thank you!

Your tip works. 

I upgrade to 0.6.0 by $ pip install https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/tensorflow-0.6.0-py2-none-any.whl.

I am a fresher in tensorflow. May I ask you one more question?

I execute the word2vec_optimized.py on pycharm. The output below seems right. 

When I inspect the code, I find that it should execute -- print("Epoch %4d Step %8d: lr = %5.3f words/sec = %8.0f\r" % (epoch, step, lr, rate), end=""). 

But in console its output does not appear, while the later output of [print("Eval %4d/%d accuracy = %4.1f%%" % (correct, total, correct \* 100.0 / total))] shows.

Besides, I can' t find the file vocab.txt or model.ckpt created by the program. I think the files haven' t been created yet.

How can I fix it?
